name: And Then There Were Fewer
description:
Developed by the team I Dunno Man for GDW. 

"And Then There Were Fewer" is a single player, top down detective murder mystery game.

Players take the role of an intrepid detective who finds herself trapped inside a sprawling mansion. With the discovery of a dead body, and a potential killer on the loose, it’s up to you to find out which of the 6 other guests committed the crime!

● Explore the various rooms of a mysterious mansion, and discover the many secrets that are within.

● Interact with an eccentric cast of intriguing characters. Everyone’s got something to hide!

● Trust is key! Depending on how you choose to approach suspects in your interrogations, they may either help or hinder your investigation. The crime might even be pinned on you, if you’re not careful!

Controls:

Keyboard or WASD to move

E to Interact with objects/initiate dialogue

Team:

  • Jayce Lovell (Programmer) (Not in GDW but still a member)
  • Javier Orduno (Programmer)
  • Toma Ikomi (Programmer/Game Design/Main Writer)
  • Lay Ndiaye (Artist/ Sound Designer)
  • Fahad Tariq (Game Design/Artist/Co-Writer)
  • Adnan Kasujja (Game Design/Co-Writer)
